'''Ekenu''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

The caretaker of the tomb of Periki located below the Guild - and frequently the entire guild. He's a watershaper of middling skill, but the Guild found a place for him.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [The Shadow Under Neketaka](/theShadowUnderNeketaka/)
|none            = 
|other           =
}}

## =Quests

=
* [The Shadow Under Neketaka](/theShadowUnderNeketaka/): Ekenu gives you a rundown of what transpired at the guild.
[Category:Periki's Overlook characters](/categoryPerikisOverlookCharacters/)
